H0.text: Which boxer became the first to defeat Evander Holyfield in November 1992 to become undisputed Heavyweight Champion. Mike Tyson

H1.text: Which boxer became the first to defeat Evander Holyfield in November 1992 to become undisputed Heavyweight Champion. Lennox Lewis

H2.text: Which boxer became the first to defeat Evander Holyfield in November 1992 to become undisputed Heavyweight Champion. George Foreman

H3.text: Which boxer became the first to defeat Evander Holyfield in November 1992 to become undisputed Heavyweight Champion. Riddick Bowe

A4.text: In November 1992 he fought reigning champ Evander Holyfield for the undisputed heavyweight title. Bowe won a unanimous decision in an entertaining fight, flooring Holyfield in the 11th round.

A5.text: In 1992 he became the unified heavyweight champion by winning the World Boxing Association (WBA), World Boxing Council (WBC) and International Boxing Federation (IBF) titles by defeating then-unbeaten former undisputed cruiserweight champion Evander Holyfield.
